name: 3D Immersive Experience for Mars
short_description: The user can interact with the rovers and follow their journeys across the diverse Martian terrains. At various key points in the rover's path, sign posts are clickable to deploy streaming slideshows of acquired science and interesting tidbits. The user will also be able to drill down into panoramas and view Mars at rover level. Using the Unity3D development engine, we were able to integrate the actual terrain DEMS acquired from MRO's HiRISE camera. Additionally, telemetry from the rover (temperature, visibility, power, distance traveled, etc.)
summary: Users can interact with the Mars rovers and follow their journeys.
